Title: France markets extra storage capacity worth 20 LNG cargoes for next winter
Description: French transmission system operator Terega is marketing an additional 22,700 GWh of storage capacity for the winter of 2023-2024, on top of the 10,500 GWh sold during previous auctions. This extra capacity represents the equivalent of around 20 cargoes of 165,000 m3 of LNG.
Author: DE

Title: Freeport may short-load cargoes during initial restart period, supporting LNG prices
Description: A much-anticipated return to operations of the shuttered 15 mtpa Freeport LNG plant in Texas from next month will add needed supplies to the market amid supply disruptions at other plants, but the boost may be smaller than initially expected.
Author: CK
